channel.title: Comments on: Choose The Right Because It Is Right, Even When It Is Hard

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/05/16/choose-the-right-because-it-is-right-even-when-it-is-hard/#comment-3417">Elizabeth Scott</a>.
It can be a tough lesson to learn. I think part of it is realizing that making your own little part of the world a better place is just as critical and trying to make the whole world a better place.
